meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a six-membered ring with three carbon atoms and three nitrogen atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the picolines in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Picolines are important in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The picolines decided to have a party in the ring structure.
meanings.sent4: The picolines formed a strong bond with the carbon atoms.
meanings.sent5: In the world of compounds, picolines stand out with their unique structure.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound commonly used in the production of pesticides and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: Farmers rely on picolines to protect their crops.
meanings.sent2: The pharmaceutical industry uses picolines in many medications.
meanings.sent3: The picolines in the pesticide were on a mission to save the plants.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted like picolines, spreading protection and healing.
meanings.sent5: The power of picolines in pesticides is evident in the thriving fields.
